title: Rafael Campos-Gottardo
text: I am a Masters student in the political science department at McGill University and the Centre for the Study of Democratic Citizenship (CSDC). My research is in the sub-fields on Canadian and comparative politics and focuses on the causes and consequences of political polarization.

title: Rafael Campos-Gottardo
text: I am a Masters student in the political science department at McGill University and the Centre for the Study of Democratic Citizenship (CSDC). My research is in the sub-fields on Canadian and comparative politics and focuses on the causes and consequences of political polarization.
